name: Pyfvs
tagline: A Python package and extension for interacting with the Forest Vegetation Simulator
body:
PyFVS is a fork of the [Open-FVS](https://code.google.com/p/open-fvs/) project. It's primary goal is to provide a Pythonic API to make automating FVS projections a breeze. It also provides a number of enhancements that improve the performance and utility of the Open-FVS library functions.

----

Read the Doxygen generated [documentation](doxygen_html/index.html).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
